original: Sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sa āsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: anāsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa āsavam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: sa āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na sa āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
